credit_line: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
title: Tea kettle and stand
description: Three-legged stand (c) with pierced lower frame for lamp and upper frame to support kettle. Legs attached to frame with three copper rivets. Upperframe recessed to hold pierced grill(d). Pressed glass candle lamp (e) fit-ted with brass cover with flange handle (f). Grill tinned on underside.
name: Tea kettle and stand
